question.text:
FFFS Seminar Schedule and Price Guide

Orlando "3 Weeks to Riches!" 3 weeks $1,500
New York "The Big Apple is Yours" 5 days $750
Boston "Revolutionary" 13 days $1,200
Seatle "Prepare for Your Rainy Day" 20 days $3,000

answer.explanation:
Transcript:
Hello, everyone. I would like to begin today’s seminar by asking you all to consider a few questions. First, how many of you would like to be rich? Everyone? Exactly. Second, how many of you would like to be happy? Everyone? Of course! Q2 I can promise you all that if you follow a few simple steps, you will be able to make your financial and life goals a reality. The Fast Forward Financial System, or FFFS, that I have developed is an easy step-by-step guide to living the good life. Q3 Today’s seminar is just an introduction of course. In order to fulfill your financial potential, you will need to enroll in one of our immersion programs.

question.text: Look at the graphic. What is the longest course?
Why is the listener most likely at the seminar?
choices: (D) They were invited by a friend.

Script:
W-Br: Hi, Ken. Thanks for making a chart comparing the features of the copy machines we’re considering for our office. I know we’ve already talked about price, so looking at this information, Q1 I think we can go with the one without all the extra features. We really don’t need them for the work we do. Also .. uh ... one question: Q2 should we have it shipped by express or regular delivery? We need it by the beginning of next week. Either way, Q3 you’ll need to talk to Pedro. He’ll give you the corporate credit card to make the purchase. Thanks for taking care of this.

answer.explanation:
Transcript:
Thank you all for coming to this meeting on such short notice. Q3 It has come to my attention that the Human Resource Department has been overwhelmed lately with reports about messes in the common areas. As your regional manager, I feel it is my responsibility to take ownership of this problem before it gets completely out of control. Just so everybody is clear, the common areas include the kitchen, the foyer, recreation room A, and lounge c on the second floor. I don’t know who is responsible for this recent run of uncleanliness, but from now on we are going to assign a staff member to monitor the condition of each area and sign off on it at the end of every day. We will do this until I feel everyone has learned to respect the space. Be sure to check the schedule to see which area you will be responsible for.

question.text: Who is speaking to the staff?
Look at the graphic. Which employee was given responsibility for two common areas on the same day?
What is indicated in the meeting?
choices: (B) The staff will need to work weekends,
(D) There have been a lot of complaints.

answer.text: (D) There have been a lot of complaints.

answer.explanation:
Script:
M-Cn: Thank you all for being here at tonight’s city planning meeting. Q1 First on the agenda is the budget for the bike path project. We have almost all the funds we need. Q2 We’re applied for a grant from a private foundation that would cover the money that we still need to begin the project. If this foundation agrees to fund our project, we’ll be able to start construction of the bycicle paths next April. They’ll be built along the canal and run all the way into the city center. Based on our research, Q3 we anticipate that our bike paths will considerably lessen the traffic congestion on our roads.

question.text: What type of the project is the speaker discussing?
Look at the graphic.  How much money is still needed to begin the project?
According to the speaker, what major advantage will the project have?
choices: (B) It will bring more stores to the area.
(D) It will lover the cost of public transportation.

answer.explanation: (M-Au):  May I have your attention, please? There has been a room change for one of <u>this afternoon's management training sessions.</u> <u>More people registered for the workshop Creating Spreadsheets than expected, so that training session has been moved to Conference Room A, which is a larger room.</u> No other changes are anticipated at this time, but be sure to check for updates throughout the afternoon. <u>We'll post any schedule changes on the boards outside of the meeting rooms.</u>

choices: (A)By logging on to a conference Web site
(C)By requesting a text message on their phones

answer.explanation: (W-Am):  Good morning, Radio 82 listeners. On today's show we'll be joined by <u> Adam Brennan, the lead singer from the rock music group Thunderbear.</u> This group, based right here in Toronto, gained a worldwide following after the release of their debut album, Room for Two, last year. And <u>next month the group will begin their first European tour.</u> Mr. Brennan will be joining us shortly to talk about the upcoming tour. Until then,<u> let's listen to one of the hit songs from the group's album.</u>

answer.explanation: (W-Am):  Hello, XPA radio listeners. This is Meg Williams, with news of events around the local area. This weekend, <u>the Hartman Medical Clinic is hosting a health and wellness fair.</u> There will be activities for the whole family — including cooking demonstrations and children’s games — plus lots of information about diet and exercise. And doctors from the clinic will be offering eye examinations. <u>They've reduced the cost for the eye exams, so this is a good time to have your vision checked.</u> <u>You'll need an appointment, though. If you're interested, be sure to visit the Hartman Web site, at www.Hartman.com, to sign up.</u>

answer.explanation: (W-Br):  And finally this evening, on behalf of the Organization of Film Musicians, I'm delighted to announce the winner of the lifetime achievement award. This award goes to <u>Rebecca Langhorn, one of our most exceptional composers of music for films</u>.<u>I met Rebecca on her very first project, when we collaborated on the soundtrack for the movie A Year in Denmark.</u> Since then, Rebecca has gone on to compose music for more than 50 other movies, and her music has become familiar to audiences worldwide. <u>We now have a short video of movie clips for you, highlighting some of Rebecca's best-known pieces.</u>

question.text: What is Rebecca Langhorn known for?
How does the speaker know Rebecca Langhorn?
choices: (A)They grew up in the same town.
(D)They performed together in a music group.

answer.explanation: (M-Cn):  Hi, Ms. Patel, it's Matthew Schwartz from Green Grounds. I just wanted <u>to confirm the landscaping details for the office park you manage.</u> As we discussed,<u>we'll be planting 70 new trees and bushes throughout the property. We'll also put in a large flower garden in the courtyard.</u> You mentioned that you might want us to do some additional work near the pond. If you could call me and explain what you'd like to have done there, <u>I can prepare a final price estimate for you.</u> We look forward to working with you on this project.

answer.explanation: (M-Au):  Welcome aboard Parkwood Transit Line B. This train runs from Parkwood to Wellington, with several stops in between. Unfortunately, <u> because of repairs on the Wellington bridge, trains are running more slowly than usual.</u> We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. Be advised that <u>if you are headed for the International Airport, you should get off the train at Wellington and switch to Line C,</u> where the Airport Express train will be waiting. <u> At this time, we request that all passengers have their tickets ready for inspection,</u> as the conductor will be coming through in just a few minutes.
